website_summaries.verdict: Fila Axilus 2 Energized is snagged by pros as they come stable and durable. If Fila fans adored the supportive build of the original model, they might find the modified Axilus 2 more appealing. Fila tweaked on the fitting and upper design a bit to enhance the shoe’s breathability and improve its comfort feel. The brand also kept the hallmark features of the flagship all-court trainer, so it remains to be supportive. It’s one of the extremely affordable trainers backed by an outsole durability guarantee.
pros: Many reviewers report having no break-in or rubbing issues with the Fila Axilus 2 Energized
Numerous playtesters claim that minimal cushioning gives them better ground contact
A bulk of the comments indicate that this stability trainer appeals to many players with wide feet
As described by plenty of users, this footgear delivers lots of grip to spring around the court
A considerable number of wearers attest that this kick grants sufficient airflow
Several committed players are impressed by the outsole’s durability
Quite a lot of buyers find this Fila shoe to be lightweight
cons: Some wearers wish for more plushness underneath as the cushioning is quite firm
More than a few medium- and narrow-footed wearers find this version to be too wide

customer_reviews.title: worst tennis shoe I have ever used, regret!!
customer_reviews.text: After using it in tennis court for couple of times, my left foot got a new pain point. I had to switch back to Prince tennis shoe and the pain disappeared soon. The shoe is just not strong enough to protect foot. it may be a good and comfortable for walking, absolutely not good for tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves!
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for dad whose favorite color is bright orange. He loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: classy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and comfy as it is as pictured but better in person. Nice fit and netter than average cushion in heel area,
customer_reviews.author: Michael Golden

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable for folks with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The give in the front of the shoes is very comfortable for those of us with wide feet even when not made as a W shoe. Works well with playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments from co-workers & customers
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes!!!! Fit is great, comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Schutt

customer_reviews.title: Footwear
customer_reviews.text: I love these tennis shows. They fit my feet perfectly and feel comfortable on my feet and love the color and style too. I am completely satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Fila shoes are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Sorry for the late feedback. Love Fila shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: It was the arch support
customer_reviews.text: What I like was that able to the arch support on the bottom of the shoes .
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Robles

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend anybody to order these shoes they're fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my dress shoes I love the orange and lime green they match my shirts I'm going to order another pair
customer_reviews.author: Dave Vierck

customer_reviews.title: Best looking tennis shoe at the courts.
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on these shoes. They look fantastic. Not all the comfortable because there's not much padding. They're not uncomfortable, but there are more comfortable shoes to choose from. But they are fast on the court because they're low to the ground and lightweight. I usually have to buy New Balance because I have wide feet. These shoes fit my wide feet just fine. I also like the 6 month guarantee on the soles. I will look at Fila shoes each season when it's time to buy new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: topseed

product_meta.title: Fila Men's Axilus 2 Energized Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: Designed to perform. Elevated to outpace every other shoe on the court. The FILA Axilus 2 Energized puts the agility FILA fans love front and center, featuring tennis pro-approved response, lightness and style. An arch-boosting sockliner and foot cage deliver a made-for-you fit, while an enhanced rubber outsole and molded, energy-boosting cushioning deliver incredible stability and a light as-air stride.
feature_bullets: This shoe comes with FILA`s 6-Month Outsole Durability GuaranteeThe Fila Men`s Axilus 2 Energized Tennis Shoe represents the brand`s latest iteration of high-performance footwear.
It builds upon the design of the original Axilus Energized with a few tweaks, and does a fantastic job of promoting responsiveness, stability, and comfort...
Energized Rubber Cushioning | Molded Forefoot Cage | Performance Tennis Shoe
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
